metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25584 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in the parse_module function in bfd/vms-alpha.c in Binutils.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25584` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-common - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-for-build - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-for-host - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-multiarch - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-source - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
libbinutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
libctf0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs.

criterions.comment: binutils package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.38-4ubuntu2.2').
